mapper.insert: insert into item (item_type_id, title, price, content, sale_status, create_datetime, update_datetime, filename, filepath) values (#{itemTypeId}, #{title}, #{price}, #{content}, #{saleStatus}, #{createDatetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDatetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filename}, #{filepath})
mapper.select: select * from item order by item_id desc
